text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
Great
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since yesterday?
I got most of the CI/CD pipeline to work
attachments.text: I got most of the CI/CD pipeline to work
attachments.title: What did you do since yesterday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Use Helm for the pipeline and fix the scrum board: ask me for invite. Also going to look at nextjs if i've got the time.
attachments.text: Use Helm for the pipeline and fix the scrum board: ask me for invite. Also going to look at nextjs if i've got the time.

attachments.fallback:
Anything blocking your progress?
Gitlab not being stupid
